attributes.additional_details: A promise is a promise so David Cameron should be made to keep his promise to the people of Great Britain! I feel it's unlawful what he is doing! We need to make David Cameron act now on the results of our democratic vote!
attributes.background: There was a democratic vote and LEAVE won why wait till October? David Cameron should evoke article 50 now! In a speech a few weeks ago he promised he would get the ball rolling if LEAVE won he is now going back on his word! We need to be GREAT again sooner rather than later! I love my country!
